home.homeDesc:
Full-Stack Engineer building scalable, performance-driven web
 & mobile experiences with clean architecture and refined motion.

about.point1: I’m a Jordan-based Full-Stack Developer fluent in Arabic and English. I build scalable web and mobile applications with a strong focus on performance, structure, and clean architecture.
about.point2: I’ve engineered complex systems from scratch — building custom masonry layouts, drag-and-drop interactions, optimized ordering logic, and tailored virtualization strategies designed to handle large datasets efficiently.
about.point3: I care about how applications behave under real usage — how data flows, how components scale, and how interactions feel. My goal is to build products that are fast, predictable, and built to last.
about.point4: On the backend, I design structured APIs, manage databases, and implement secure data flows with a focus on scalability and clarity. I work with Node.js, MongoDB, and Supabase to build reliable systems that handle authentication, storage, and real-time updates efficiently.
